description.text:
A $(b;winter)dragon$()! It's a shadow dragon! - The pixie hides behind you - Are you able to $(b;autumn)take it down$()?
 Please be careful! It's ok if we can't get the Elytra! We'll just be exiles forever! 
 But...I rather spend eternity being hunted down, as long as it's together with you! 
 - The pixie clings on to you sobbing - 
 I'm sorry! I tricked you in making a contract and saying your name! I just wanted a champion for my own! I'm sorry!
 If we survive this, i'll tell you my name, and you won't be bound to me any longer! I promise!

description.translate:
You...defeated him! You actually did it! - The pixie hugs you tightly - 
 As promised...I'll tell you my name....-the pixie whispers her name in your ear-
